ComicInfo.Summary: From the minds that brought you the smash hit NASH comes DEMONSLAYER, an epic tale of love and tragedy. DEMONSLAYER is the story of Jaclyn and Michael whose love is torn asunder by dark forces beyond their control. When a tragic accident takes Jaclyn away from Michael, the loss is too much for him to bear. Consumed with guilt, Michael makes a pact with the devil himself to bring her back. However, unknown to Michael, Jaclyn never perished. Now his soul is lost and in the ultimate twist of irony, Jaclyn must destroy the monster her love created! With a plot twist at every turn, DEMONSLAYER will keep you guessing to the very end. This gothic fantasy-adventure is brought to you by NEXT ENTERTAINMENT with spectacular art by Marat Mychaels and Jaime Mendoza.
